author: Florian Beuren
description: Jägermeister spice and rich cassis combine wonderfully in this after-dinner sipper, with subtle black liquorice and aniseed.
name: Naughty German
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass

video.description: Jägermeister spice and rich cassis combine wonderfully in this after-dinner sipper, with subtle black liquorice and aniseed.
video.name: HOWTO make Naughty German
